titles.title: Think DIFFERENTLY About Ending Learning Loss Act
Think DIFFERENTLY About Ending Learning Loss Act

To require the Secretary of Education to conduct a study and submit a report on the effect of education policies during the COVID-19 pandemic on the academic achievement and functional performance of students with an individualized education program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Think DIFFERENTLY About Ending Learning Loss Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to study and report on the impact of school policies during the COVID-19 pandemic on public school students in grades K-12 with an individualized education plan (commonly referred to as an IEP).
